Detailed Description

Corresponds to a Subsystem entry in 'pci.ids'.

Contains the Subvendor code, Subdevice code and Subsystem name.

See also:
pci_ids.cc

Definition at line 248 of file pci_device_ids.hpp.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

PciIdsSubsys::PciIdsSubsys ( PciIdsDevice *  sParent,
std::string  sVendor,
std::string  sDevice,
std::string  sName 
) [inline]

Constructor.

Create a Pci IDs Subsystem instance with provided subvendor, subdevices codes and subsystem name. And add itself to the list of Subsystems of provided Device.

Parameters:
sParent Pointer to Device of the Subsystem.
sVendor Subvendor Code.
sDevice Subdevice Code.
sName Subsystem Name.
